author: llunerti
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes the range of the following histograms under the Muons/diMuonHistograms area of the Offline DQM:
- LooseLooseMuon
- LooseLooseMuon_Barrel
- LooseLooseMuon_EndCap
- MediumMediumMuon 
- MediumMediumMuon_Barrel
- MediumMediumMuon_EndCap 
- TightTightMuon 
- TightTightMuon_Barrel
- TightTightMuon_EndCap 

The ranges of all the above plots were not centered on the Z peak, so they were showing no entries (e.g. https://tinyurl.com/ytbrrk9w). To fix this I've just put the correct mass range around the Z peak (namely from `HighMassMin` to `HighMassMax` defined [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/DQMOffline/Muon/python/diMuonHistograms_cfi.py#L22-L23)).

#### PR validation:
I have checked that the above plots are filled as intended by running the `10842.0` Z->MuMu workflow on CMSSW_13_2_6. The Z peak was visible as expected.

FYI @caruta 

P.S. This PR was opened by mistake in the main branch: [https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43026](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43026)
title: fixed dimuon invariant mass plots range
